Question
========

The prefix that is least sensitive to the presence of outliers in a sample of observations is the

Answerlist
----------

* Quartile spacing
* Spread width
* Standard deviation

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Quartile spacing: Correct
* Spread width: Incorrect
* Standard deviation: Incorrect
